newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Electronic Arts raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Electronic Arts raised.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said its analyst Keith Benjamin raised his rating on shares of video game maker Electronic Arts Inc to buy from long-term attractive based on price.
-- In a statement, he said the stock's recent weakness does not seem to be justified given its positioning on major video game platforms.

-- Benjamin sees "a strong product line-up" for the next several quarters, and he expects earnings in the company's third quarter, ending December 31, "will be at least in line with expectations with some room for positive surprises."
